00020 
00021 /* Bump Node */
00022 
00023 __device void svm_node_set_bump(ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint c_offset, uint x_offset, uint y_offset)
00024 {
00025 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00026     float h_c = stack_load_float(stack, c_offset);
00027     float h_x = stack_load_float(stack, x_offset);
00028     float h_y = stack_load_float(stack, y_offset);
00029 
00030     float3 Rx = cross(sd->dP.dy, sd->N);
00031     float3 Ry = cross(sd->N, sd->dP.dx);
00032 
00033     float det = dot(sd->dP.dx, Rx);
00034     float3 surfgrad = (h_x - h_c)*Rx + (h_y - h_c)*Ry;
00035 
00036     surfgrad *= 0.1f; /* todo: remove this factor */
00037 
00038     float absdet = fabsf(det);
00039     sd->N = normalize(absdet*sd->N - signf(det)*surfgrad);
00040 #endif
00041 }
00042 
00043 /* Displacement Node */
00044 
00045 __device void svm_node_set_displacement(ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint fac_offset)
00046 {
00047     float d = stack_load_float(stack, fac_offset);
00048     sd->P += sd->N*d*0.1f; /* todo: get rid of this factor */
00049 }
